title: Update regarding BlockChain Verify
story_body:
BlackRock, Inc. (BLK) is rumored to be considering an acquisition of Blockchain Verify, according to people familiar with the matter. The potential deal, which has not been confirmed by either company, was first reported at 08:45 EST.

As of 09:00 EST, neither BlackRock, Inc. (BLK) nor Blockchain Verify has issued a statement regarding the rumored acquisition. It is unclear what terms or valuation may be involved in the potential deal.

People familiar with the matter have indicated that discussions between the two companies are ongoing, but it is uncertain whether an agreement will be reached. The rumor has not been substantiated by either company, and no further information is available at this time.

At 09:15 EST, shares of BlackRock, Inc. (BLK) were trading at $542.50, up 0.5% from the previous close. Blockchain Verify is a privately held company and does not have publicly traded shares.

This report is based on information from people familiar with the matter and has not been confirmed by BlackRock, Inc. (BLK) or Blockchain Verify. As such, it is considered speculative and should be treated with caution until further information becomes available.
